scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket koutsopoulosw-deployment --output-template-file outputSamTemplate.yml --s3-prefix cloudformation-lambda-ddb-example-api --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file outputSamTemplate.yml --stack-name cloudformation-lambda-ddb-example-api --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides BucketName=koutsopoulosw-deployment --region us-east-1
